Question: This person viewed English colonists were compelled to rely on "common sense" and rediscover the "laws of nature".
Hints: In turn, Cosway had Trumbull create a portrait of this person which she kept.
Peter this person died in 1757 and the ____ estate was divided between Peter's two sons; Thomas and Randolph.
This person believed that each man has "certain inalienable rights".
